original_text:
Ram was the father of
Amminadab, and Amminadab the father of Nahshon, the leader of the people of Judah.
korean_text: 람은 암미나답을 낳고 암미나답은 나손을 낳았으니 나손은 유다 자손의 방백이며

sentences.original_text: Ram was the father of Amminadab
and Amminadab the father of Nahshon
the leader of the people of Judah
